content: the puff in space between double_crochet ch1 11 times slip_stitch to fi rst double_crochet to join and does not count towards any additional chs that may fasten_off come after the puff 12 v stitches 12 ch1 space bptr-v - back post treble v_stitch bptr ch1 bptr original design by polly plum copyright © 2016 all rights reserved page 1 fan dance polly plum 12 afghan block by note in this round you ll be working only into the ch1 spaces round 9 with new yarn standing single_crochet in next single_crochet after slip_stitch join so just plan on skipping all the dcs i m not going to tell you of r8 middle single_crochet of three single_crochet group before 5tr corner ch1 skip to next single_crochet *^ bptr-v around next treble_crochet ch1 5 times skip next single_crochet round 4 with new yarn standing single_crochet in any ch1 space single_crochet in next single_crochet middle of the three ch1 skip next single_crochet and double_crochet 5dc between v stitches of r3 *ch1 puff in ch1 space of v in ch1 space of v_stitch ch1 twice ^ skip next double_crochet and single_crochet single_crochet in stitch ch1 single_crochet in next ch1 space * repeat from * to * 10 times next single_crochet ch1 * repeat from * to * two times and from ^ to ^ more ch1 puff in ch1 space of next v_stitch ch1 slip_stitch once more slip_stitch to fi rst single_crochet to join and fasten_off to fi rst single_crochet do not fasten_off 5 bptr-v stitches 40 double_crochet 12 single_crochet 40 ch1 space 12 single_crochet 12 puff stitches 24 ch1 spaces round 10 with new yarn standing double_crochet in same single_crochet as joining note in this round you ll be skipping all the ch1 spaces from single_crochet from r9 ch1 double_crochet in same stitch counts as fi rst v the last round *^working around bptr of bptr-v stitches of r9 bpdc ch1 round 5 ch1 single_crochet in same single_crochet as connecting slip_stitch from r4 5 double_crochet 3 times bptr ch1 twice ch2 bptr ch1 twice bpdc ch1 in eye of next puff single_crochet in next single_crochet 11 times 5 double_crochet in eye twice bpdc v_stitch in next single_crochet skip next double_crochet bpdc in next of last puff slip_stitch to fi rst single_crochet to join fasten_off three double_crochet skip next double_crochet twice ^ v_stitch in next single_crochet * repeat 60 double_crochet 12 single_crochet from * to * two times and then from ^ to ^ once more slip_stitch to fi rst single_crochet to join round 6 with new yarn standing bpsc in second double_crochet of 16 bptr 48 bpdc 12 v stitches 4 ch2 space 32 ch1 space any group of 5dc bpsc in next two double_crochet *^ch1 skip next double_crochet puff in next single_crochet chain 1 skip next double_crochet ^ bpsc in next 3 double_crochet * round 11 with same yarn ch2 counts as fi rst half_double_crochet or with repeat from * to * 10 times and from ^ to ^ once slip_stitch to new
